# Interface ElevenLabsSpeechSynthesisConfigInterface

Interface for ElevenLabs speech synthesis configuration.

interface ElevenLabsSpeechSynthesisConfigInterface {  
queryParams?: [ElevenLabsQueryParamsInterface](./primitives_tts_config.ElevenLabsQueryParamsInterface);  
requestParams?: [ElevenLabsRequestParamsInterface](./primitives_tts_config.ElevenLabsRequestParamsInterface);  
}
